items.name: Longsword
items.description: A standard longsword with a double-edged blade.

items.name: Shortsword
items.description: A light blade favored by rogues and dual-wielders.

items.name: Rapier
items.description: A thin, elegant blade favored by duelists. Perfect for Charles.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: A tall bow requiring strength to draw.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: A simple blade. Everyone should carry one.

items.name: Sunsteel Longsword +1
items.description: Forged with Molten-blessed ore. Glows faintly amber in darkness.
items.effect: +1 fire damage on critical hits.

items.name: Blackwood Composite Bow
items.description: Layered blackwood, horn, and sinew. The limbs strain with barely contained force.
items.effect: Advantage on long-range attacks. No disadvantage at long range. Once per turn add proficiency to damage at long range. Crits deal 3d10.

items.name: Shadowstep Daggers
items.description: A matched pair of blackened steel daggers. Shadows coil around wounds.
items.effect: Both daggers hitting same target: +2d6 necrotic. Once per short rest: bonus action teleport 30ft to dim light/darkness.

items.name: Venomfang Shortsword
items.description: Greenish blade with channels for poison. Perfect for Umbrys.
items.effect: Holds 3 poison doses. Applying poison is bonus action. Poison lasts 1 hour instead of 1 minute.

items.name: Tide-Touched Trident
items.description: Blessed by Pelagos priests. Returns when thrown into water.
items.effect: Returns from water. Advantage on attacks while partially submerged.

items.name: Studded Leather
items.description: Reinforced leather with metal rivets. A scout's favorite.

items.name: Studded Leather +1
items.description: Masterwork studded leather with enchanted rivets. Great for Charles.

items.name: Shadowweave Leather
items.description: Leather woven with captured shadow. Absorbs light at its edges.
items.effect: Advantage on Stealth in dim light/darkness. Reaction when hit: become invisible until end of next turn (1/long rest).

items.name: Breastplate
items.description: A fitted metal chestpiece. Good protection without sacrificing mobility.

items.name: Ranger's Breastplate +1
items.description: Breastplate etched with forest motifs. Perfect for Kaelen or Elara.
items.effect: No Stealth disadvantage. +2 to saves vs being frightened by beasts.

items.name: Plate Armor
items.description: Full plate armor. The ultimate in protection for Magnus.

items.name: Plate Armor +1
items.description: Masterfully crafted plate with enchanted joints that never rust.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.effect: Regain 2d4+2 hit points
items.description: A vial of red liquid that shimmers when agitated.

items.name: Greater Potion of Healing
items.effect: Regain 4d4+4 hit points
items.description: A larger vial of deep crimson liquid.

items.name: Superior Potion of Healing
items.effect: Regain 8d4+8 hit points
items.description: A flask of brilliant ruby liquid pulsing with vitality.

items.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
items.effect: Resistance to fire damage for 1 hour
items.description: Orange liquid with ember-like particles.

items.name: Antitoxin
items.effect: Advantage on saves vs poison for 1 hour
items.description: Murky green liquid. Tastes terrible but works.

items.name: Basic Poison (vial)
items.effect: DC 10 Con save or 1d4 poison damage
items.description: Simple contact poison. Illegal in most settlements.

items.name: Drow Poison
items.effect: DC 13 Con save or unconscious for 1 hour
items.description: Viscous black liquid. Possession punishable by wardens.

items.name: Serpent Venom
items.effect: DC 11 Con save or 3d6 poison damage
items.description: Milked from sea serpents near The Bolt Isle. Great for Umbrys.

items.name: Purple Worm Poison
items.effect: DC 19 Con save or 12d6 poison damage, half on save
items.description: Extracted from creatures best left undisturbed. Possession is death sentence.

items.name: Thieves' Tools
items.description: Picks, files, and prybars. Technically legal to own.

items.name: Masterwork Thieves' Tools
items.effect: +2 bonus to checks with these tools
items.description: Expertly crafted picks from finest steel. Perfect for Charles.

items.name: Alchemist's Supplies
items.description: Glass vials, metal frame, mixing cups, and chemicals.

items.name: Arrows (20)
items.description: A quiver of twenty standard arrows.

items.name: Silvered Arrows (10)
items.description: Silver-tipped arrows. Essential for certain creatures.

items.name: Fire Arrows (5)
items.description: Oil-soaked tips with alchemical igniters. Blessed by Aurush.

items.name: Cloak of Protection
items.effect: +1 to AC and saving throws
items.description: A fine cloak with subtle protective enchantments.

items.name: Bag of Holding
items.effect: Holds 500 lbs in extradimensional space. Always weighs 15 lbs.
items.description: A simple cloth sack opening into extradimensional space.

items.name: Goggles of Night
items.effect: Darkvision 60 feet
items.description: Leather goggles with dark lenses that absorb light. Good for humans without darkvision.

items.name: Ring of Evasion
items.effect: 3 charges (regains 1d3 daily). When you fail a Dex save, use reaction + 1 charge to succeed.
items.description: Silver ring etched with runes of swiftness. Perfect for Charles or Umbrys.

items.name: Amulet of Aurush
items.effect: Spellcasting focus. +1 fire damage on fire spells.
items.description: Golden sun disc on chain. Warm to the touch.

items.name: Telluria Root-Ring
items.effect: Spellcasting focus. Once per day cast Speak with Plants.
items.description: Ring carved from Heartwood root. Occasionally sprouts tiny leaves. Good for Kaelen.

items.name: Pelagos Tide-Pearl
items.effect: Spellcasting focus. Glows within 100ft of deep water.
items.description: Large pearl in silver wave-shaped clasp.

items.name: Forged Travel Papers
items.effect: DC 18 Investigation to detect forgery
items.description: High-quality forgeries with convincing seals.

items.name: Warden's Badge (Stolen)
items.effect: Advantage on Deception when impersonating Warden. DEATH PENALTY if caught.
items.description: Authentic badge taken from someone who no longer needs it.

items.name: Map of Hidden Coves
items.effect: Shows 1d4+1 smuggler coves along a coastline
items.description: Hand-drawn charts showing where boats can land unseen.

items.name: Scroll of Cure Wounds
items.effect: Cast Cure Wounds (1d8+3)
items.description: Simple healing scroll from temple scribes.

items.name: Scroll of Pass Without Trace
items.effect: Cast Pass Without Trace (+10 Stealth, no tracks)
items.description: Scroll bearing Telluria's blessing with pressed leaves.

items.name: Scroll of Revivify
items.effect: Cast Revivify (requires 300gp diamond)
items.description: Sacred scroll to restore life. Temples guard these carefully.

items.name: Healer's Kit
items.effect: Stabilize dying creature without check
items.description: Bandages, salves, and splints.

items.name: Rope (50 feet)
items.description: Fifty feet of hempen rope.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: Four-pronged iron hook for climbing.
